Name: Shmup Love Boom
About the game: Shmup Love Boom is a modern styled Shoot-Em-Up with anime influences. Includes multiple visual novel style cut scenes and dialogue featuring some beautiful anime women and some classic hard faced men in suits and an evil alien threat that wants to destroy Earth once and for all. Following in the footsteps of games like Xenon; Shmup Love Boom is a detailed bullet hell intense top down shooter experience. SYNOPSIS: In the far flung future humanity lives on the brink of war with a group of neighboring aliens. When the Sol barrier is breached only one pilot is close enough to do anything about it. Once he is geared up with one of the beautiful symbiot warriors his ship is ready for action to fend off these alien marauders and take the fight to them for the first time in a decade.
